page.title: 11Modern houses in Annan
page.content: In Annan there are lots of new houses being built. A house with 3 {bedrooms}would be enough for 5 people, and a house with 2{bedrooms}would hold 2 to 4 people. Each house has a {living_room}and a{kitchen,}the kitchen usually containing a fridge, a cooker, a washing_machine, a sink, and some built_in cupboards and drawers. All houses have a{bathroom}which also contains a{toilet,}and some have a separate toilet as well. Most new houses are of two storeys and have a small front and back {garden.}They are built of{brick}with {wooden}window and door frames. Most new houses built in Annan in 1985 have been built by Annandale and Eskdale {District Council}and are in the Hallmeadow part of the town.
